properties.name: poe.oauth.url
properties.description: Base link for path of exile OAuth API.

properties.name: redirect.uri
properties.description: redirect uri after getting code and state from poe/authorize.

properties.name: spring.jwt.secret
properties.description: Encryption secret used for encoding JWT tokens.

properties.name: spring.jwt.jwtExpirationInMs
properties.description: Duration til expiry of JWT token.
